name: Adverse Impact Ratio (AIR)
definition: Measures the selection rate of a protected group compared to the group with the highest selection rate to detect algorithmic bias in AI screening tools.

calculation_logic.abstract: Selection rate of protected group divided by the selection rate of the majority group.
calculation_logic.sql_standard: SELECT (COUNT(CASE WHEN group = 'protected' AND status = 'hired' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(CASE WHEN group = 'protected' THEN 1 END)) / (COUNT(CASE WHEN group = 'majority' AND status = 'hired' THEN 1 END) / COUNT(CASE WHEN group = 'majority' THEN 1 END)) FROM recruitment_data

name: AI Decision Explainability Coverage
definition: The percentage of automated employment decisions (promotion, termination, hiring) where a human-readable explanation is logged as per EU AI Act Article 13.

calculation_logic.abstract: Count of AI decisions with associated 'reasoning_metadata' divided by total AI decisions.
calculation_logic.sql_standard: SELECT (COUNT(decision_id) FILTER (WHERE explanation_blob IS NOT NULL) * 100.0 / COUNT(decision_id)) FROM ai_decision_logs

name: Data Minimization Compliance Rate
definition: Measures the proportion of candidate profiles that do not contain sensitive data beyond what is strictly necessary for the high-risk AI purpose.

calculation_logic.abstract: Total records minus records containing unnecessary PII fields divided by total records.
calculation_logic.sql_standard: SELECT (COUNT(*) - COUNT(CASE WHEN non_essential_pii_flag = TRUE THEN 1 END)) / COUNT(*) FROM candidate_profiles
